member.name: FIND_BY_SID_OUTPUT
member.summary: The FIND_BY_SID_OUTPUT structure represents the fully qualified path name of a file.

member.name: FIND_BY_SID_OUTPUT.NextEntryOffset
member.summary: Number of bytes that must be skipped to get to the next record. A value of zero indicates that this is the last record.

member.name: FIND_BY_SID_OUTPUT.FileNameLength
member.summary: The size of the file name, in bytes. This size does not include the NULL character.

member.name: FIND_BY_SID_OUTPUT.FileName
member.summary: A null-terminated string that specifies the file name.
